_source.short_desc: Qualtrics CoreXM is the top-rated market research tool to drive better decisions with real-time insights and reporting.
_source.long_desc: Faster results, deeper market knowledge with Qualtrics. Use market research tools designed to go deeper. From ad testing and product design to market segmentation and competitor benchmarking, our market research platform gives you not just the knowledge you need but the insights and actions to create transformative results. Go from 'what' to 'why' with deep processing and predictive capabilities including sentiment analysis and market trend reporting. Take control of your market research data.
_source.target_audience: Organizations of any size seeking a research platform that delivers the insights that drive real change, momentum, and growth.

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most Affordable Survey Software Report
The Top 20 Most User Friendly Survey Software Report

related_products.short_desc: The ultimate market research tool: 95% of users get more data, more easily when they switch to Typeform
related_products.features: Get better market research insights with interactive forms that are actually fun to complete, and super easy to make. Typeforms are fully customizable to your brand, with a sleek interface that's responsive and asks one question at a time-just like a real conversation. Get useful insights and reports in your dashboard, plus 120+ integrations let you hook Typeform up to your favorite apps, so you can automatically send responses wherever you want, as they come in.

related_products.short_desc: Online survey tool that lets you create unlimited surveys, distribute them and analyze the data  with ease.
related_products.features:
Zoho Survey is easy-to-use online survey and questionnaire building software. Our features are scalable to suit yourneeds, with everything essential to create surveys, distribute them, and analyze responses.Survey panels are also available, if you needdata from specific demographics.
Informed decisions are just around the corner.Learn more about Zoho Survey at https://www.zoho.com/survey/.

related_products.short_desc: Tango Card bundles simple technology, great rewards, and expert service to help companies get the most out of their reward programs.
related_products.features: Tango Card provides leading incentive-delivery technology to organizations in the B2B space. Globally, enterprise companies use this technology to deliver an extensive catalog of domestic and global e-gift cards as part of consumer loyalty programs, sales incentive programs, health and wellness engagement, and employee recognition. Tango Card believes instantly delivering the most desirable rewards maximizes impact and drives real business results.

related_products.short_desc: Survey software for the creation, distribution, and analysis of surveys, polls, and forms.
related_products.features:
QuestionPro is a SaaS survey solutions company offering applications to measure and manage customer experience, employee engagement, and the pulse of the audience. Obtain accurate insights using conjoint analysis, MaxDiff analysis, sentiment analysis, TURF analysis, heatmap analysis, etc. Export data to external tools like SPSS and R Software and integrate with 20+ applications.

We are ISO 27001 certified and comply with leading data security standards and data privacy laws including GDPR.

related_products.short_desc: MediaRadar is a customizable advertising intelligence platform that is targeted to the needs of media sellers, buyers, and planners.
related_products.features: MediaRadar's award-winning advertising intelligence solutions deliver timely cross-media insights that are targeted to those that are involved in the media selling, planning, or buying processes. Media selling teams rely on MediaRadar to prospect for new business, create compelling pitches and connect with the right buyers. Agencies and marketers use MediaRadar to create the best media mix, monitor their competitors, and uncover new advertising opportunities.

related_products.short_desc: Get answers fast with Nextiva Surveys, a custom online market research software. Collect the answers you need to understand audience.
related_products.features: Get answers fast with Nextiva Surveys, our custom online market research software. Collect the answers you need to understand your audience and make better decisions. Featuring nine question types, survey templates, email notifications, skip logic, and more, Nextiva Surveys provides the tools needed to measure respondents. Plus businesses can customize landing pages, thank you pages, colors, and everything in between! Seamlessly integrate with other Nextiva products for a full view of audiences.

related_products.short_desc: Pollfish is a DIY, mobile-first market research platform, offering access to 450M+ mobile consumers across more than 160 countries.
related_products.features: Pollfish is the only consumer-focused market research platform that owns the full end-to-end experience, enabling brands, agencies and SMEs to reach over 500 million real mobile consumers who are randomly selected to spontaneously take surveys in the apps already installed on their devices - leading to better quality data, delivered faster and at a lower cost than traditional market research companies or legacy DIY offerings.

related_products.short_desc: The most professional survey software for your company (NPS, Customer satisfaction, HR, Employee feedback, Customer Experience)
related_products.features:
The most professional survey software for your company. Popular survey types:
- NPS, Customer satisfaction, 
- HR, Employee feedback, Customer Experience, Exit Interview, Candidate Experience
- Website widget

related_products.short_desc: CheckMarket's online survey software is the quickest and easiest way to get the right questions in front of the right people.
related_products.features: You need answers, and you need them quickly. Whether you're conducting ad hoc market research, want to gather quick feedback on advertising or product concepts, or launching a sophisticated insights campaign as a seasoned researcher, CheckMarket's online survey software is the quickest and easiest way to get the right questions in front of the right people at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: SmartSurvey is an online survey solution that helps anyone create surveys, collect data and analyse results.
related_products.features: With the SmartSurvey SaaS platform, users can capture, analyse and report virtually any type of data via a simple, yet stylish, online survey service. SmartSurvey allows users to directly reach the people whose opinions matter the most, clients, partners, patients, students and suppliers. SmartSurvey specialises in providing survey solutions for multinational business and enterprise clients, offering dedicated support and secure data storage on UK/EU based servers.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Increase your market intelligence with accurate insights delivered in days, not months. Deeply understand your market, elevate your brand, and build winning products with our purpose-built insights solutions--tailored to your industry, organization, role, or need. Contact us to learn about our market research solutions like industry tracking, competitive intelligence, concept and creative testing, pricing research, and brand tracking, or work with us to custom build your own study.

similar_products.short_desc: Access real-time data, through a centralized innovation dashboard designed to support R&D strategy.
similar_products.features:
Cypris delivers actionable market intelligence to R&D and innovation teams. The platform analyzes and tracks over 500M+ data points from over 150 countries every day, including new entrants, patents, research papers, startups, and more.

Users access live data through a centralized innovation dashboard designed to support R&D strategy and request custom reports based on specific research needs. Together, the innovation dashboard and custom reports serve as a dedicated research arm.

similar_products.short_desc: Cobalt provides unparalleled market insights that help enterprise brands, agencies, and investors win the Amazon channel.
similar_products.features:
Jungle Scout Cobalt is the leading market intelligence and product insights platform built to help enterprise brands, agencies, and investors win the Amazon channel. 

Cobalt provides the industry's most accurate Amazon sales data to empower ecommerce businesses with competitive intelligence, product and category trends, market share data, and actionable insights into consumer behavior.

similar_products.short_desc: SurveyMonkey Audience is the fastest DIY market research solution.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Audience is the fastest DIY market research solution. Built right into the SurveyMonkey platform, we've integrated with panels in over 100 countries to enable global consumer research anytime, anywhere, and for any budget. Target respondents by demographics, firmographics or custom screening questions, automatically launch projects on your schedule, and start seeing results in real-time.

similar_products.short_desc: Our mission is to help customers find, research, and connect with privately held companies - using data to transform the M&A industry.
similar_products.features: SourceScrub is the world's leading data service for firms looking to research, find and connect with privately held companies. Our Private Company Intelligence platform allows  deal teams to take a data-driven approach in a traditionally opaque segment of the market. We combine state-of-the-art technology with an unmatched QA process resulting in the freshest and most accurate data set available.

similar_products.short_desc: Pollfish is a DIY, mobile-first market research platform, offering access to 450M+ mobile consumers across more than 160 countries.
similar_products.features: Pollfish is the only consumer-focused market research platform that owns the full end-to-end experience, enabling brands, agencies and SMEs to reach over 500 million real mobile consumers who are randomly selected to spontaneously take surveys in the apps already installed on their devices - leading to better quality data, delivered faster and at a lower cost than traditional market research companies or legacy DIY offerings.

similar_products.short_desc: Tremendous is the industry leader in market research rewards and incentives.
similar_products.features: Tremendous is the leading provider of rewards and incentives for market research companies across the world. Attract and incentivize market research participants and instantly reward them with a catalog of gift cards, prepaid Visa? cards, cash and more. It's never been easier for market researchers to buy, track and manage digital incentives at scale. You can automate the process by integrating with our API, or send rewards individually and in bulk with the Tremendous platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Know your target market inside-out. Gauge market pulse, assess competition & keep up with the fluctuating market trends.
similar_products.features:
SurveySparrow's Market Research Software helps steer your marketing strategies in the right direction. 

Target your ideal audience across channels viz. web, mobile, social & email. Gauge Market Pulse periodically with scheduled surveys & reports. 

With advanced reporting filters, uncover critical research insights to stay ahead of competition & keep up with fluctuating market conditions.

Integrate with the top marketing tools & achieve a seamless workflow. Experience true automation.

similar_products.short_desc: Kantar Marketplace is an automated market research platform designed for marketing agility. Get rapid insights to build your brand.
similar_products.features:
Kantar Marketplace is an automated market research platform designed for insights professionals, marketers and agencies who want to test, learn and move faster.

The platform is built on a foundation of industry-leading expertise and proven methodologies, delivering results in hours, not days via best-in-class dashboards. It features a range of consumer insights tools including validated research solutions.

similar_products.short_desc: Easily buy, send & track digital gift card rewards with Giftbit. Use our web app for individual or bulk rewards, or integrate via API.
similar_products.features:
Use Giftbit to send and track digital gift cards for your rewards and incentive needs. Buy at face value & track individually, or in bulk through our easy-to-use web application. Prefer to automate? Trigger via the apps you already use, or integrate directly with our API.

Giftbit is simple, and easy to use. Upload your recipients, customize your reward email and choose from over 50 merchant brands to offer. Get stats on everything you need to monitor the success of your program.

similar_products.short_desc: Collaborative survey platform for survey design, data collection, analysis & reporting. Available in hosted and on-premises versions.
similar_products.features:
Snap Surveys offers Snap XMP, a collaborative online survey platform for survey design, data collection, feedback management, and advanced analysis and customized reporting.
Create engaging, measurable experiences - surveys, forms, evaluations, and more. Design in any survey mode - online, mobile, offline, and scannable paper surveys - in any language. 
Host surveys using Snap Online for secure survey management or install the On-Premises Server Edition to host surveys on your own server.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use, but industry strength cloud based mobile, online, CAPI and CATI platform for the professional Market Research industry.
similar_products.features: Nfield is a powerful cloud based data collection platform for professional market research organizations. It features all you need to conduct high quality, professional and secure surveys. Nfield is available for CAPI and Online interviewing. Nfield is delivered as a service: hosted and managed by NIPO Software. For you this means: no servers, no licenses and no IT costs. NIPO Software takes care of running the IT infrastructure and making sure the platform is available 24x7.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Satisfaction software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Satisfaction tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Satisfaction software allows businesses to collect, organize, and manage customer feedback. These applications provide survey, complaint tracking and call reporting capabilities. Customer Satisfaction software can integrate with Customer Relationship Management and Product Management solutions to help apply the acquired feedback to business interactions and product development.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Survey software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Survey tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Survey software enables the efficient design and management of electronic surveys, polls, and questionnaires for market research, measuring customer satisfaction, and collecting employee feedback, along with many other applications. Survey software automates designing, scheduling, publishing, and conducting surveys while featuring a variety of user feedback formats including: radio buttons, check boxes, drop-down menus, and free-form text fields. Survey solutions also accommodate a variety of methodological approaches and provide data reporting tools. Survey software is related to Business Intelligence software and Reporting software.

_source.short_desc: From customer insights to market segmentation to concept testing, Qualtrics is the single solution for all of your experience data.
_source.long_desc: Qualtrics CoreXM is the top rated online survey tool to capture, analyse and act on data. Our flexible platform features makes it easy for you to build beautiful, complex surveys with drag and drop ease. You are in control. Leverage 100+ question types, embedded data, branching, display logic, quotas, email triggers, mobile and offline compatibility, randomisation, and all the advanced features you'll ever need. Have our team of industry experts help you get started today!
_source.target_audience: Organizations of any size seeking a research platform that delivers the insights that drive real change, momentum, and growth.

category_features.name: Data Analysis Tools
category_features.definition: Analyze survey results via statistical testing or crosstabs directly within the software

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Mobile Survey
category_features.definition: Distribute a survey via mobile devices

category_features.name: Offline Response Collection
category_features.definition: Allow participants to fill out and submit the survey without internet connection

category_features.name: Question Branching
category_features.definition: Show participants specific questions based on their answer to a previous question (ie. different paths)

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Site Intercept Survey
category_features.definition: Survey popup over a webpage to specific users based on their behavior

category_features.name: Skip Logic
category_features.definition: Avoid showing participants irrelevant questions as determined by the answer to a previous question

category_features.name: Support Audio/Images/Video
category_features.definition: Allow media to be embedded in the question or answer options

category_features.name: URL Customization
category_features.definition: Change the URL of your survey to fit your branding or survey title

category_features.name: Audience Targeting
category_features.definition: Identify a particular segment of population based on specific criteria and customize your efforts to attract their attention

category_features.name: Artwork Management
category_features.definition: Streamline design processes and ensure brand accuracy so assets can be pushed live more quickly.

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Change Management
category_features.definition: Track and monitor efficient handling of all changes/transitions

category_features.name: Fulfillment Distribution
category_features.definition: Access a central warehouse of data and files for efficient and controlled distribution of assets.

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Workflow Management
category_features.definition: Create, design, and automate processes within the software

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Benchmarking
category_features.definition: Compare key metrics for the business against prominent players in the industry

category_features.name: Social Media Monitoring
category_features.definition: Track activity on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

category_features.name: Benchmarking
category_features.definition: Compare key metrics for the business against prominent players in the industry

category_features.name: Face-to-Face
category_features.definition: Market research conducted via in-person interviews

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Distribution
category_features.definition: Offers more than one survey distribution channel (email, web link, social media, etc.) .

category_features.name: Panel Management
category_features.definition: Conduct and manage panel discussions for the purpose of market research

category_features.name: Paper-Based
category_features.definition: Market research conducted via paper

category_features.name: Phone-Based
category_features.definition: Market research conducted via telephone

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Assemble and deliver relevant data points

category_features.name: Statistical Analysis
category_features.definition: Apply statistical models to the survey data

category_features.name: Survey Builder
category_features.definition: Create and manage surveys

category_features.name: Survey Sample Management
category_features.definition: Manage sample of audience for conducting market research surveys

category_features.name: Competitor Price Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor and compare prices for competing products

category_features.name: Custom Pricing Rules
category_features.definition: Create custom predefined rules for prices for products and services

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Dynamic Pricing
category_features.definition: Real-time price adjustment for a product or service to reflect changing market conditions, geolocation, customer behavior, etc.

category_features.name: Elasticity-based pricing
category_features.definition: calculate the price elasticity of demand by analyzing pricing and market data to find the most optimal price points

category_features.name: Machine Learning
category_features.definition: Enable businesses to implement machine learning algorithms on business data such as sales and revenue

category_features.name: Market Data Analysis
category_features.definition: Collect data from multiple sources within the market (competing products, customer behavior, season, weather, special events, etc)

category_features.name: Multi-Store
category_features.definition: Manage multiple teams and operations from a central location

category_features.name: Predictive Pricing Models
category_features.definition: Use simulation models and scenario planning to predict and compare strategy outcomes for prices and promotions

category_features.name: Price Forecasting
category_features.definition: Form predictions for optimal prices based on past and present data (market data, competitor products, special events, weather, etc.)

category_features.name: Price List Management
category_features.definition: Create and manage price lists for products, customer segments, and geographic locations.

category_features.name: Price differentiation
category_features.definition: Create unique pricing based on product, store, geography, or customer segmentation

category_features.name: Pricing Analytics
category_features.definition: Track and analyze key pricing metrics for reports, pricing intelligence dashboards, historical data tracking, trend analysis, etc

category_features.name: Profitability Analysis
category_features.definition: Evaluate the degree to which business operations bring monetary gains

category_features.name: Promotion Optimization
category_features.definition: Assess and optimize pricing markdowns, special offers, promos, and more

category_features.name: Repricing engine
category_features.definition: AI-driven algorithms that allow for automatic repricing in real-time

category_features.name: Annotations
category_features.definition: Highlight content and/or make notations about parts of content

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Sentiment Analysis
category_features.definition: Categorize emotions expressed in written text and identify if they are positive, negative or neutral

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
related_products.features: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

related_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
related_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

related_products.short_desc: Create engaging, platform-independent and beautiful surveys. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to collect feedback.
related_products.features:
SurveyLegend is the next generation of online surveys engaging, platform-independent & beautiful. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to create mobile-friendly, gorgeous surveys.

Now you can create great-looking surveys on your PC or tablet, customize the look of your survey however you like, & display collected data with eye-catching & insightful graphics. Creating questionnaires is done simply by drag & drop, & you don't need to be a market research expert to use our tool.

related_products.short_desc: Collect more useful feedback with surveys that look and feel great. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps.
related_products.features: Get more insights and useful feedback using Typeform: over 1.5 million typeforms are submitted every single day. Why? Our forms look amazing (and are fully customizable to your brand), plus the smooth and responsive UI makes filling them in a pleasure. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps lets you send data automatically wherever you need it. Plus, it's quick and simple to make a typeform: get started with our easy form builder, and launch your survey in minutes.

related_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

related_products.short_desc: Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar!
related_products.features:
Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar.
Hotjar Surveys allow you to ask your site visitors an unlimited number of questions, from an unlimited number of respondents. On-site surveys appear as pop-up widgets on your webpage(s), and external link surveys appear as stand-alone pages with their own designated web address (URL). Use our pre-built templates or create your own.

related_products.short_desc: Online survey tool that lets you create unlimited surveys, distribute them and analyze the data  with ease.

Informed decisions are just around the corner.Learn more about Zoho Survey at https://www.zoho.com/survey/.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkTango enables companies to give their employees a voice and easily collect feedback for any purpose to support actionable insight.
similar_products.features:
The WorkTango platform creates a space for employees to have a voice and helps companies easily gather frequent feedback for any engagement, transformation, or feedback initiative. 

Using data science and natural language understanding, actionable insights from employee feedback are served in real-time to Human Resources, C-Suite executives, and people leaders. 

The results are quicker insight, better people actionable decisions, and a more aligned and engaged workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey software and no per-response fees.
similar_products.features: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey and customer feedback software that's flexible enough for each team to use it their way, while still giving IT full security control and insight. Alchemer won Fastest Implementation, Easiest Setup, and Best Meets Requirements from users at G2.com. Get the feedback you need with the most question types and no per-response fees.

similar_products.short_desc: Coach, motivate, and empower your employees to make every customer experience awesome.
similar_products.features:
Get more repeat purchases and referrals by improving your customers' experiences. Collect real-time customer feedback to motivate, engage, and coach your service providers so they can deliver exceptional customer experiences, every time. 

Discover why AskNicely is the leading Customer Experience Management solution. Learn more at asknicely.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile, AI-powered platform to give every decision-maker in your organization the power to reshape your customer experience, your product, or your industry. Leveraging 20 plus years of expertise and over 55 billion responses by 6 billion respondents, Momentive is powered by real human inputs, based on proven best practices and delivers exceptional user experience. Trusted by over 98% of Fortune 500 companies.

similar_products.short_desc: HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance.
similar_products.features:
HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance, instantly and over time.

Our range of easy-to-use feedback-collecting Smileys, analytics, and reporting helps companies make informed decisions based on real-time, continuous data. Know how you're doing, what works (and what doesn't), and when and where to improve.

Additional Success services included, such as onboarding, customer support, Help Center, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Enterprise empowers businesses to capture and act on critical feedback to drive growth and innovation at scale with advanced security and compliance features. Integrate survey feedback with your technology stack to enrich decision-making and automate workflows. SurveyMonkey's products, enterprise solutions, and integrations enable more than 335,000 organizations to deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention, and unlock growth and innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Uncover the hidden drivers of engagement & measure the pulse of your company culture with Leapsome?s employee engagement surveys.
similar_products.features:
With Leapsome you can run engagement surveys, pulse surveys, and collect eNPS to gather meaningful feedback and insights from employees. With the powerful survey analytics you can understand the engagement drivers that impact performance levels and employee churn so you can develop and retain your team.

Furthermore, Leapsome is an all-in-one people management platform used by CEOs and HR teams to not only drive employee engagement but also performance and learning as well.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Market Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Market Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Market Research software helps researchers effectively recruit, survey and maintain panel members and gather data. Using this software can yield consumer insight into marketing appeal, promotions effectiveness, product development, and customer service. A single interface can control all panel functions, including frequently used questions, panel invitations, questionnaire design, data gathering and export, and member database. Managers of online surveys and focus groups are common users of this type of software. Market Research software is related to Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top NPS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of NPS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: NPS software helps organizations implement campaigns to measure net promoter scores. NPS is a customer and employee satisfaction benchmark calculated using surveys. The final score can be used to gauge loyalty to the brand or organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Polling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Polling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Polling software automates feedback solicitation and opinion collection, often in real time, from a wide range of audiences through means as diverse as telephones, mobile devices, and other tools.

_source.short_desc: From customer insights to market segmentation to concept testing, Qualtrics is the single solution for all of your experience data.
_source.long_desc: Price your products for maximum profitability with Qualtrics. Qualtrics is your single platform for pricing research. Run data-driven pricing studies like Van Westendorp price sensitivity meter, Gabor-Granger analysis, and powerful conjoint optimisation projects ? all via the same platform. Compare price ranges from different studies to launch your product with the optimal price. Have our team of industry experts help you get started today, book your free demo!
_source.target_audience: Organizations of any size seeking a research platform that delivers the insights that drive real change, momentum, and growth.

category_features.name: Competitor Price Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor and compare prices for competing products

category_features.name: Custom Pricing Rules
category_features.definition: Create custom predefined rules for prices for products and services

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Dynamic Pricing
category_features.definition: Real-time price adjustment for a product or service to reflect changing market conditions, geolocation, customer behavior, etc.

category_features.name: Elasticity-based pricing
category_features.definition: calculate the price elasticity of demand by analyzing pricing and market data to find the most optimal price points

category_features.name: Machine Learning
category_features.definition: Enable businesses to implement machine learning algorithms on business data such as sales and revenue

category_features.name: Market Data Analysis
category_features.definition: Collect data from multiple sources within the market (competing products, customer behavior, season, weather, special events, etc)

category_features.name: Multi-Store
category_features.definition: Manage multiple teams and operations from a central location

category_features.name: Predictive Pricing Models
category_features.definition: Use simulation models and scenario planning to predict and compare strategy outcomes for prices and promotions

category_features.name: Price Forecasting
category_features.definition: Form predictions for optimal prices based on past and present data (market data, competitor products, special events, weather, etc.)

category_features.name: Price List Management
category_features.definition: Create and manage price lists for products, customer segments, and geographic locations.

category_features.name: Price differentiation
category_features.definition: Create unique pricing based on product, store, geography, or customer segmentation

category_features.name: Pricing Analytics
category_features.definition: Track and analyze key pricing metrics for reports, pricing intelligence dashboards, historical data tracking, trend analysis, etc

category_features.name: Profitability Analysis
category_features.definition: Evaluate the degree to which business operations bring monetary gains

category_features.name: Promotion Optimization
category_features.definition: Assess and optimize pricing markdowns, special offers, promos, and more

category_features.name: Repricing engine
category_features.definition: AI-driven algorithms that allow for automatic repricing in real-time

category_features.name: Benchmarking
category_features.definition: Compare key metrics for the business against prominent players in the industry

category_features.name: Face-to-Face
category_features.definition: Market research conducted via in-person interviews

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Distribution
category_features.definition: Offers more than one survey distribution channel (email, web link, social media, etc.) .

category_features.name: Panel Management
category_features.definition: Conduct and manage panel discussions for the purpose of market research

category_features.name: Paper-Based
category_features.definition: Market research conducted via paper

category_features.name: Phone-Based
category_features.definition: Market research conducted via telephone

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: Assemble and deliver relevant data points

category_features.name: Statistical Analysis
category_features.definition: Apply statistical models to the survey data

category_features.name: Survey Builder
category_features.definition: Create and manage surveys

category_features.name: Survey Sample Management
category_features.definition: Manage sample of audience for conducting market research surveys

category_features.name: Annotations
category_features.definition: Highlight content and/or make notations about parts of content

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Sentiment Analysis
category_features.definition: Categorize emotions expressed in written text and identify if they are positive, negative or neutral

category_features.name: Data Analysis Tools
category_features.definition: Analyze survey results via statistical testing or crosstabs directly within the software

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Mobile Survey
category_features.definition: Distribute a survey via mobile devices

category_features.name: Offline Response Collection
category_features.definition: Allow participants to fill out and submit the survey without internet connection

category_features.name: Question Branching
category_features.definition: Show participants specific questions based on their answer to a previous question (ie. different paths)

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Site Intercept Survey
category_features.definition: Survey popup over a webpage to specific users based on their behavior

category_features.name: Skip Logic
category_features.definition: Avoid showing participants irrelevant questions as determined by the answer to a previous question

category_features.name: Support Audio/Images/Video
category_features.definition: Allow media to be embedded in the question or answer options

category_features.name: URL Customization
category_features.definition: Change the URL of your survey to fit your branding or survey title

related_products.short_desc: Easy to use price optimization tool that helps retailers make data-driven decisions.
related_products.features: Online sellers of all sizes trust Prisync for enhancing their pricing decisions using data. Our price tracking tool brings them valuable price and stock availability data on a simple dashboard. And our dynamic pricing tool allows them to match or beat anyone's prices without spending a minute. On average, retailers catch a 20% increase in sales using Prisync, just for a week's coffee money. Our customer support team is live 24/7 to offer the fastest solutions to our customers' problems.

related_products.short_desc: eCommerce professionals from around the globe put their trust into Price2Spy when trying to optimize their prices.
related_products.features: eCommerce professionals from around the globe put their trust into Price2Spy when trying to optimize their prices. Our dashboard will provide you with all the price information that you might need.  The AI and ML-based tool will help you to detect your market position within minutes which makes beating the competition much easier. All price changes will be automatically spotted, and you'll receive an alert email. It doesn't get more accurate than this!

related_products.short_desc: Competera is an AI-powered platform helping enterprise retailers to set optimal prices daily.
related_products.features: Competera enables retailers and brands to increase customer trust by setting and maintaining optimal price positions on a real-time basis. Our deep learning algorithms increase our enterprise clients' gross margin by 6%, continuously calculating and re-quantifying billions of possible price combinations. Recommendations appearing across the entire pricing life cycle from initial, shelf to markdown, and promo price are based on 20+ pricing and non-pricing factors.

related_products.short_desc: Repricing Central is a repricing tool for Amazon merchants designed to automatically reprice their items and Win the Buy Box.
related_products.features:
BQool Repricing Central makes it easy for you, Amazon sellers, to optimize their pricing strategies and efforts, turning your Amazon selling business into a profitable endeavor. The tool monitors your competitors and detect any pricing activity and automatically adjusts the price of your products so that you are able to keep up but still ensure that you gain significant profit and improve your sales as well as your sellers rank.

*Update: Now with InventoryLab Synchronization

related_products.short_desc: Rate Shopper is a one-time hotel price intelligence software providing a 360-degree view of market rates to set the best room rates.
related_products.features: Rate Shopper is a hotel price intelligence tool that automates the hotel pricing policy across all channels from a single dashboard. It includes AI-powered actionable insights to track competitor rates, set the pricing strategy to maximize your RevPAR and occupancy rate, maintain rate parity and integrity across all channels and demand sources. Have an instant edge on market rate by monitoring the rate change 24/7 and updating your room rates unlimited times.

related_products.short_desc: Rate Shopper is a one-time hotel price intelligence software providing a 360-degree view of market rates to set the best room rates.
related_products.features: Rate Shopper is a hotel price intelligence tool that automates the hotel pricing policy across all channels from a single dashboard. It includes AI-powered actionable insights to track competitor rates, set the pricing strategy to maximize your RevPAR and occupancy rate, maintain rate parity and integrity across all channels and demand sources. Have an instant edge on market rate by monitoring the rate change 24/7 and updating your room rates unlimited times.

related_products.short_desc: SellerActives repricing technology and multichannel product listing sync maximizes your reach across Amazon, eBay, Walmart, and more.
related_products.features: SellerActive's channel management platform allows online sellers to automate tedious processes and free up time to grow their business. Our software streamlines processes like smarter automated repricing and synchronized product listings across multiple marketplaces such as Amazon, Walmart, Jet and eBay, including new listing creation. Gain real-time visibility into your multichannel product listings and the ability to grow without fear of overselling or out-of-stocks.

related_products.short_desc: Effortless, instant, automated repricing. Win the Amazon Buy Box & easily sync prices to eBay with the fastest automated repricer.
related_products.features: Win the Amazon Buy Box & easily sync prices to eBay with the fastest automated repricer. Repricer.com reacts to competitor's changes within 90 seconds, so the moment a rival seller reprices or goes out of stock, we adjust immediately to get you the Buy Box.  Repricer.com maximizes your profit margins by pricing upwards when the competitive environment allows, so you sell at the best price possible.

related_products.short_desc: Formerly known as GoSpotCheck, FORM MarketX is the market execution app that guides, tracks, and improves performance in real-time.
related_products.features: Formerly known as GoSpotCheck, FORM MarketX unleashes the power of field teams to drive market execution with the only mobile solution that combines dynamic task management, industry-leading image recognition, photo reporting, field team communications, and advanced reporting - all within one easy-to-use platform. Guide teams, improve execution and drive sales while creating a shared view of the field that helps leaders make better decisions, faster.

related_products.short_desc: TrackStreet is an industry-leading SaaS (Software as a Service) platform that leverages the power of artificial intelligence.
related_products.features: TrackStreet is an industry leading SaaS (Software as a Service) platform that leverages the power of artificial intelligence and automation to build a suite of tools which protect, assess and grow brands. They monitor what's happening with your brand across the internet and deliver actionable market data so you can focus on building stronger customer relationships, driving sales, and building the bottom line.

related_products.short_desc: Simple-to-use, fully automated and controllable dynamic pricing software for smaller hotels.
related_products.features: "Simple but amazingly efficient and fully automated solution. The Holy Grail for small to medium sized hotels! " And it wasn't even us who said that, but HotelMinder.com in their independent reviews! A controllable, fully-automated solution for a) small independent hotels with no experience of pricing, b) chains of small hotels with group revenue management,  and c) busy revenue managers who want help with pricing but want to have control over strategy. See the difference with a free trial...

No manual competitor URL gathering required.

Skuuudle provides price and product intelligence for the world's largest retailers and distributers, as well as many growing small and medium businesses.

similar_products.short_desc: Competitive price monitoring and dynamic pricing system. We specialize in helping e-commerce businesses win their markets.
similar_products.features:
PriceShape is a SaaS company, specializing in competitive price monitoring for e-commerce companies and brands. We help online sellers streamline their pricing strategy, based on competitor data. Including: Prices, Stock and Assortment.

With PriceShape, you get a complete overview of competitors product prices, displayed in a personalized dashboard, with daily updates through price monitoring. We also specialize in providing our users with a wide variety of dynamic pricing strategies & rules.

similar_products.short_desc: Unique tool enabling you to use advanced price setting, achieve better price performance and create actionable price insights.
similar_products.features:
PriceEdge is a unique Price Optimization and Management software enabling you to use advanced price setting, achieve better price-performance and create actionable price insights. It helps you find price improvement opportunities, measure price effectiveness, and provides a clear overview of the pricing impact over time. 
Our API provides a series of benefits from smooth integration to high security that will help your business be faster and better.

similar_products.short_desc: Rate Shopper is a one-time hotel price intelligence software providing a 360-degree view of market rates to set the best room rates.
similar_products.features: Rate Shopper is a hotel price intelligence tool that automates the hotel pricing policy across all channels from a single dashboard. It includes AI-powered actionable insights to track competitor rates, set the pricing strategy to maximize your RevPAR and occupancy rate, maintain rate parity and integrity across all channels and demand sources. Have an instant edge on market rate by monitoring the rate change 24/7 and updating your room rates unlimited times.

similar_products.short_desc: Trade promotion optimization (TPO) solution designed for CPG manufacturers. Harmonize your data and automate post-event analysis.
similar_products.features: Blacksmith TPO is a trade promotion optimization SaaS application designed for CPG manufacturers. It applies advanced analytics and AI to analyze and optimize your promotional events and customer plans. Blacksmith TPO offers comprehensive post-event analysis and powerful, predictive constraint-based planning to quantify and improve your return on investment. Our customers include CPG companies like Kellogg's, Welch's, Land O' Lakes and more. Let's talk!

similar_products.short_desc: The most complete revenue management software in the short-term rental industry designed to help you earn more revenue and save time.
similar_products.features:
Thousands of teams, from individual hosts to beloved hospitality brands, partner with Wheelhouse to maximize the value of their unique accommodations offerings. 

Our software suite includes a highly adaptable pricing engine, detailed market reports,  competitive tracking tools, and more, to help you make ever faster & more informed decisions.

We pride ourselves on providing best-in-class 24/7 support, designed to amplify our platform's ambition to both support & empower your unique goals.

similar_products.short_desc: It is possible to pay monthly, yearly or an annual contract with monthly payment.
similar_products.features: AvaiBook does not have a free version, but offers a free demo trial. The paid version of AvaiBook has two plans: Standard and Pro, the price is calculated according to the number of accommodations and there is no commission per booking.

similar_products.short_desc: The government contract proposal pricing software that helps develop, analyze, submit, and negotiate cost and pricing data.
similar_products.features:
ProPricer is a proposal pricing software built to produce solutions to maximize efficiency and accuracy in the development, submission, evaluation, negotiation, and audit of proposal pricing. From storage of historical proposal data to ease of generating various reports, 

ProPricer empowers Government Contractors to quickly and easily build custom proposals, perform what-if analyses, and integrate all proposal data-all with one software platform.

similar_products.short_desc: #1 Revenue Management Solution for Short-Term Rental Managers and Owners to Get, Grow, and Keep Revenue
similar_products.features:
Beyond (formerly Beyond Pricing) is a revenue management solution for short-term rental managers and owners to get, grow, and keep revenue. Our easy-to-use platform includes a dynamic, demand-driven pricing tool with extensive market data that pairs with OTA distribution and a best-in-class booking engine.

We have helped thousands of property managers and property owners get the most out of their listings. To date, we have supported over 340,000 properties in more than 7,500 cities worldwide.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Retail Management systems on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Retail Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Retail Management Systems software manages financial reporting, accounting, and operations of retail stores by integrating core business processes such as point of sale (POS), customer relationship management (CRM), inventory management, accounting, human resources, marketing and eCommerce. By implementing a Retail Management System, organizations can increase sales, decrease costs, and maximize their competitive advantage. These applications facilitate the distribution of key data throughout an enterprise and provide the infrastructure for accurate sales reporting and revenue forecasting.
